overview: For dOCUMENTA(13) (2012) Pierre Huyghe created Untilled, a compost site within a baroque garden, a non hierarchical association that included a sculpture of a reclining nude with a head obscured by a swarming beehive, aphrodisiac and psychotropic plants, a dog with a pink leg, an uprooted oak tree from Joseph Beuysâ€™ 7,000 Oaks among other elements.
title: A Way in Untilled
